text: Helmut Hubacher (15 April 1926 â€“ 19 August 2020) was a Swiss politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Switzerland. From 1963 to 1997, he was a member of the National Council. He was born in Krauchthal, Switzerland. Hubacher died on 19 August 2020 in Porrentruy, Switzerland at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss politicians Category:People from the canton of Bern Category:Emmental (administrative district)
title: Helmut Hubacher
